entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning before morning. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
